**Example 1: 示例**

示例

Input: 

```
tccli trocket DescribeMQTTTopic --cli-unfold-argument  \
    --InstanceId mqtt-7pnqmkrx \
    --Topic topic1
```

Output: 
```
{
    "Error": null,
    "RequestId": null,
    "Response": {
        "CreatedTime": 1705567642,
        "InstanceId": "mqtt-7pnqmkrx",
        "Remark": "",
        "RequestId": "acf7faf2-b2a9-431c-96b9-f589262da8f7",
        "Topic": "topic1"
    }
}
```
